# A Warm Greeting for Sukumar

Hello, Sukumar, bright and true,
The day shines brighter knowing you!
With warmth and joy, we greet your name,
A spark of light, a gentle flame.

May your path be filled with cheer,
And kindness follow you all year.
Welcome, friend, with open heart‚Äî

# A Greeting for Sukumar
